---
title: "Boechera Plant Health Graphing and Stats"
author: "Courtney Cameron"
date: "2025-11-16"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}


bdep <- read.table('BdepCFmaster.txt')
head(bdep)

library(ggplot2)
library(ggpattern)
library(reshape2)
library(stringr)

bdep$V2 <- as.factor(bdep$V2)
bdep$V4 <- as.factor(bdep$V4)

bdepr <- bdep
bdepr$V2 <- factor(bdepr$V2, c('T1','T6','T2','T4','T7','T3','T2M'))
head(bdepr)


#graphing and statistics for Boechera health data

list <- c('0'='none', '14'='stripes')
bpbdep_master <- ggplot(subset(bdepr, V2 %in% c('T1','T2','T4','T6')), names= label, aes(x=V2, y=V3, fill=V2, pattern_density=factor(V4)), pattern='stripes', color='black', pattern_fill='black') + 
  geom_boxplot_pattern(outlier.shape = NA, width = 0.5) +
  theme_classic()+
  labs(title=element_blank(), x=element_blank(), y='Y(II)', fill=element_blank(), pattern_density='Day',) + 
  scale_pattern_manual(values = list) +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(size = 15)) +
  scale_x_discrete(labels=c('+H20','MB+M \n+H20', '-H20', 'MB+M \n-H20 ')) +
  scale_fill_brewer(labels = c('+H20','MB+M \n+H20', '-H20', 'MB+M \n-H20 '), palette = 'Set1', guide = guide_legend(override.aes = list(pattern = 'none'))) +
  theme(legend.key.size = unit(0.75, 'cm'))+
  ylim(0,1.2)+
  theme(axis.text.y = element_text(size=12))

bpbdep_master+theme(legend.position='none',axis.title.y=element_text(size=15))

ggsave("CFP.eps", height =4 , width = 6,dpi=500)


nova = aov(bdep$V3 ~ factor(bdep$V4) / factor(bdep$V2))

summary(nova)

capture.output(summary(nova),file='aovdays.txt')

TukeyHSD(nova)



#graphing and stats for soil data

bdepo <- read.csv('cf olivias data.csv')
head(bdepo)

bdepo$Treatment <- as.factor(bdepo$Treatment)
bdepo$Day <- as.factor(bdepo$Day)

bdepro <- bdepo
bdepro$Treatment <- factor(bdepro$Treatment, c('1','6','2','4','3','5','7'))
head(bdepro)


list <- c('0'='none', '14'='stripes')
bpbdep_o <- ggplot(bdepro, names= label, aes(x=Treatment, y=Y.II., fill=Treatment, pattern_density=factor(Day)), pattern='stripes', color='black', pattern_fill='black') + 
  geom_boxplot_pattern(outlier.shape = NA, width = 0.5) +
  theme_classic()+
  labs(title=element_blank(), x=element_blank(), y='Y(II)', fill=element_blank(), pattern_density='Day',) + 
  scale_pattern_manual(values = list) +
  theme(axis.text = element_text(size = 10)) +
  scale_x_discrete(labels=c('-MB-M \n+H20','+MB+M \n+H20', '-MB-M \n-H20', '+MB+M \n-H20 ','-MB+M \n+H20','+MB-M \n-H20')) +
  scale_fill_brewer(labels = c('+H20','MB+M \n+H20', '-H20', 'MB+M \n-H20 '), palette = 'Set1', guide = guide_legend(override.aes = list(pattern = 'none'))) +
  theme(legend.key.size = unit(0.75, 'cm'))+
  ylim(0,1.2)+
  theme(axis.text.y = element_text(size=12))

bpbdep_o

nova_o = aov(bdepro$Y.II. ~ factor(bdepro$Day) / factor(bdepro$Treatment))

summary(nova_o)

TukeyHSD(nova_o)

```
